definition: coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

sentences.english: Surfing the Qiantang tides is an age-old tradition in Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 在錢塘潮上衝浪在浙江省是一種古老的傳統。

sentences.english: Scientists say, this year's Qiantang River tides are the largest in nine years.
sentences.chinese: 科學家表示，今年的錢塘潮是九年裏最大的。
